column4: I installed songbird on Karmic a couple weeks ago when Marmic came out, and it was working fine, now suddenly my media library won't load... any suggestions
Clear out your library and re-add all your music.
What is the status of songbird is it a finished work, beta etc?
it is finshed and still supported I beleive
Did you check for broken packages etc?
open system monitor and make sure all instances are closed. (Im downloading songbird now to test it, Ive never tried it before.
Also might want to look in /home/useraccount/.songbird folder and delete the folder to set back to factory defaults and lose all custom settings.
there doesn't seem to be a .songbird folder.. i might have to do a reinstall and see what happens
You did hit Ctrl+H to show hidden folders right?
Might also be in .conf or a few other places.
Bash doesnt show hidden folders by default.
no, but if you type the folder exactly, it will nav there anyway :P
Might also be in different caps etc. Might try nautilus since you dont know the exact folder name.
Its in your home folder somewhere, it saves personal customizations there.
Did you remember to purge configuration files?
